amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that the Governments of the Andean countries, including Peru, Ecuador, Bolivia, Columbia, and Venezuela, should respect the rights of prisoners, including U.S. citizens, for timely legal procedures and international standards of due process.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to express the sense of the Congress concerning the rights of prisoners in Andean countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (FL) amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
